search.query: | inputlookup alerts_lookup | search NOT [| inputlookup app_whitelist_lookup] | append [| inputlookup alert_whitelist_lookup | rename index as indexIsSpecified runtime as runtimeIsLowerThanInterval alignment as searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule delay as scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay] | eventstats max(*) as * by alert app | search _key="*" | eval reviewed=if(updated>=dateLastReview,0,1) | search app IN ($app_tok$) owner="$owner_tok$" reviewed IN ($reviewed_tok$) | fields alert hasOwner dataSourceExist indexIsSpecified runtimeIsLowerThanInterval searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay searchIsCorrectlyStructured owner app app_label | eventstats count(eval(dataSourceExist="1" AND indexIsSpecified="1" AND runtimeIsLowerThanInterval="1" AND searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule="1" AND scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay="1" AND searchIsCorrectlyStructured="1")) as alert_without_issues_count | eventstats count(eval(dataSourceExist="0" OR indexIsSpecified="0" OR runtimeIsLowerThanInterval="0" OR searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule="0" OR scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay="0" OR searchIsCorrectlyStructured="0")) as alert_with_issues_count | eventstats count(alert) as alert_count | eval alert_without_issues_count_perc=alert_without_issues_count/alert_count*100

| inputlookup alerts_lookup | search NOT [| inputlookup app_whitelist_lookup] | append [| inputlookup alert_whitelist_lookup | rename index as indexIsSpecified runtime as runtimeIsLowerThanInterval alignment as searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule delay as scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay] | eventstats max(*) as * by alert app | search _key="*" | fields actions alert app cron_schedule md5_search search

| inputlookup alerts_lookup | search NOT [| inputlookup app_whitelist_lookup] | append [| inputlookup alert_whitelist_lookup | rename index as indexIsSpecified runtime as runtimeIsLowerThanInterval alignment as searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule delay as scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay] | eventstats max(*) as * by alert app | search _key="*" | eval reviewed=if(updated>=dateLastReview,0,1) | fields alert app app_label owner reviewed
| stats count(eval(dataSourceExist="0")) as count count as total | eval raw_count=count, count=count."/".total
| stats count(eval(indexIsSpecified="0")) as count count as total | eval raw_count=count, count=count."/".total
| stats count(eval(runtimeIsLowerThanInterval="0")) as count count as total | eval raw_count=count, count=count."/".total
| stats count(eval(searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule="0")) as count count as total | eval raw_count=count, count=count."/".total
| stats count(eval(scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay="0")) as count count as total | eval raw_count=count, count=count."/".total
| stats count(eval(searchIsCorrectlyStructured="0")) as count count as total | eval raw_count=count, count=count."/".total
| stats dc(app) as count by alert | where count>1 | stats dc(alert) as count

| eval md5_search_cron_schedule=md5_search+cron_schedule | eventstats count by md5_search_cron_schedule | where count > 1 | fields alert count md5_search_cron_schedule | stats values(*) as * by md5_search_cron_schedule | stats dc(md5_search_cron_schedule) as count

| search search="*" actions="N/A" | rex field="search" "(?<last_line>.*\z)$" | rex field="last_line" "^.*\|\s*(?<command>\w+)(?:\s|$)" | rex field="last_line" "`(?<macro>.+?)(\\((?<macro_args>.+?)\\)|)\\`" | rex field="macro" mode=sed "s/\\(\\)//g" | eval macro=if(isnotnull(macro_args),(((macro . "(") . mvcount(split(macro_args,","))) . ")"),macro) | join type=outer macro [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/admin/macros | fields + title, definition | rename title as macro] | eval macro=if((definition == "()"),null,definition) | eval search=if(isnotnull(macro),definition,search) | rex field="search" "(?<last_line>.*\z)$" | rex field="last_line" "^.*\|\s*(?<command>\w+)(?:\s|$)" | lookup search_commands_lookup command OUTPUT output_command | search NOT output_command=1 | stats dc(alert) as count
| rex mode="sed" field="alert" "s/./& /g" | cluster field="alert" t=0.8 showcount=true | where cluster_count>1 | stats count
| search owner="$owner_tok$" reviewed IN ($reviewed_tok$) | fields app app_label | dedup app app_label | eval lower_app_label=lower(app_label) | sort + lower_app_label
| search app IN ($app_tok$) reviewed IN ($reviewed_tok$) | stats values(owner) as owner | mvexpand owner | eval lower_owner=lower(owner) | sort + lower_owner

panel.html:
Alert checks
Soure: Target data source must be indexed – manual
Index: If applicable, target index(es) must be specified in the search query – auto | Resource
Runtime: Runtime must be lower than the interval between one run to the next – auto
Alignment: Alert schedule must be coordinated with search time range – auto | Resource
Delay: Alert must be scheduled with at least one minute of delay – auto | Resource
Structure: Search query must be correctly structured – manual | Resource

search.query: | fields alert_without_issues_count | head 1
| fields alert_with_issues_count | head 1
| fields alert_count | head 1
| fields alert_without_issues_count_perc | head 1

| search dataSourceExist="1" indexIsSpecified="1" runtimeIsLowerThanInterval="1" searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule="1" scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay="1" searchIsCorrectlyStructured="1" | stats count(alert) as # by app_label app | rename app as app_drilldown app_label as app | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert

| search dataSourceExist="0" OR indexIsSpecified="0" OR runtimeIsLowerThanInterval="0" OR searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule="0" OR scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay="0" OR searchIsCorrectlyStructured="0" | stats count(alert) as # by app_label app | rename app as app_drilldown app_label as app | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert
| stats count(alert) as # by app_label app | rename app as app_drilldown app_label as app | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert

| stats count(eval(dataSourceExist="1" AND indexIsSpecified="1" AND runtimeIsLowerThanInterval="1" AND searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule="1" AND scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay="1" AND searchIsCorrectlyStructured="1")) as alert_without_issues_count count(eval(dataSourceExist="0" OR indexIsSpecified="0" OR runtimeIsLowerThanInterval="0" OR searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule="0" OR scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay="0" OR searchIsCorrectlyStructured="0")) as alert_with_issues_count count(alert) as alert_count by app_label app | eval %=alert_without_issues_count/alert_count*100 | fields app_label app % | rename app as app_drilldown app_label as app | sort - %
| search dataSourceExist="0" | eval dummy="$show_panels_1_tok$" | fields - dummy | fields alert | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert
| search indexIsSpecified="0" | eval dummy="$show_panels_1_tok$" | fields - dummy | fields alert | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert
| search runtimeIsLowerThanInterval="0" | eval dummy="$show_panels_1_tok$" | fields - dummy | fields alert | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert
| search searchPeriodIsAlignedWithSchedule="0" | eval dummy="$show_panels_1_tok$" | fields - dummy | fields alert | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert
| search scheduleHasAtLeastOneMinuteDelay="0" | eval dummy="$show_panels_2_tok$" | fields - dummy | fields alert | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert
| search searchIsCorrectlyStructured="0" | eval dummy="$show_panels_2_tok$" | fields - dummy | fields alert | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert
| stats dc(app) as count by alert | eval dummy="$show_panels_2_tok$" | fields - dummy | where count>1 | sort - count

| eval dummy="$show_panels_2_tok$" | fields - dummy | eval md5_search_cron_schedule=md5_search+cron_schedule | eventstats count by md5_search_cron_schedule | where count > 1 | fields alert count md5_search_cron_schedule | stats values(*) as * by md5_search_cron_schedule | sort - count | fields - md5_search_cron_schedule count | eval drilldown_alert=mvjoin('alert',"&form.alert_tok=")

| search search="*" actions="N/A" | eval dummy="$show_panels_2_tok$" | fields - dummy | rex field="search" "(?<last_line>.*\z)$" | rex field="last_line" "^.*\|\s*(?<command>\w+)(?:\s|$)" | rex field="last_line" "`(?<macro>.+?)(\\((?<macro_args>.+?)\\)|)\\`" | rex field="macro" mode=sed "s/\\(\\)//g" | eval macro=if(isnotnull(macro_args),(((macro . "(") . mvcount(split(macro_args,","))) . ")"),macro) | join type=outer macro [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/admin/macros | fields + title, definition | rename title as macro] | eval macro=if((definition == "()"),null,definition) | eval search=if(isnotnull(macro),definition,search) | rex field="search" "(?<last_line>.*\z)$" | rex field="last_line" "^.*\|\s*(?<command>\w+)(?:\s|$)" | lookup search_commands_lookup command OUTPUT output_command | search NOT output_command=1 | fields alert | eval lower_alert=lower(alert) | sort + lower_alert | fields - lower_alert

| eval alert_cluser=alert | eval dummy="$show_panels_2_tok$" | rex mode="sed" field="alert_cluser" "s/./& /g" | cluster field="alert_cluser" t=0.8 showcount=true labelonly=true | where cluster_count>1 | stats values(alert) as alert | mvexpand alert
